name: GettinGeekywithGina
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
If terms like blogging, live streaming, and SEO scare you, these tips are for you. Get tech tips each day to help you stop feeling as if you've been left in the dark. You'll not only learn what these terms are, but you'll learn how to implement them into your life right away! Come on, let's Get GEEKY!

Gina Schreck makes technology easy to understand and inspires you to implement the tips into your life to become digitally savvy! She has been helping people GET GEEKY for over 20 years. She owns a digital marketing agency, SocialKNX and helps companies magnify their brand and turn LIKES into LEADS that convert into DOLLARS! Connect with Gina on any social channel @GinaSchreck
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
